# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d663-102">在 Outlook.com 中儲存郵件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d663-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d663-103">您無法在 Outlook.com 中儲存電子郵件訊息，但您可以將其列印至您可以儲存在電腦上的 PDF。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d663-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d663-104">Windows 10 隨附的 Microsoft 列印至 PDF 實用程式可讓您直接列印任何電子郵件訊息至 PDF。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d663-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="8d663-105">選取您要儲存的郵件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d663-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="8d663-106">選取三個點</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d663-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="8d663-107">在郵件的頂端，選取</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d663-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="8d663-108">**列印**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d663-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="8d663-109">再次選取 [**列印**]，然後從 [印表機] 下拉式功能表中，選取 [ **MICROSOFT 列印為 PDF**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d663-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="8d663-110">選取 [**列印**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d663-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="8d663-111">輸入檔案名，然後選取 [**儲存**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d663-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d663-112">**附注：** 因為其他使用者可以存取您儲存至電腦但不會刪除的任何 Pdf，所以不建議在共用或公用電腦上使用這種方式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d663-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d663-113">如需有關列印的詳細資訊，請參閱[在 Outlook.com 中列印電子郵件訊息、附件和行事曆](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d663-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
